      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes and assigns table views to the lists and attributes to populate data.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - Location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is unknown.
        resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      • deletePartAction

        public void deletePartAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Deletes the selected part
        Parameters:
        event - delete part action Alert given to confirm delete. Returns to main screen if canceled. Error given if deletion not successful.

      • deleteProductAction

        public void deleteProductAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Deletes the selected product
        Parameters:
        event - delete product action Alert given to confirm delete. Returns to main screen if canceled. Checks if product has an associated part and gives error if so. Error given if deletion not successful.

      • exitAppAction

        public void exitAppAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Exits the application
        Parameters:
        event - exit button event

      • searchPartAction

        public void searchPartAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Searches parts by name/ID.
        Parameters:
        event - search part action upon hitting enter key. alert given if no results are found.

      • searchProductAction

        public void searchProductAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Searches products by name/ID.
        Parameters:
        event - search product action upon hitting enter key. alert given if no results are found.
